Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local lastAttack = 0
local r = game:service("RunService")
local damage = 28
local firePart = Instance.new("Part") firePart.FormFactor = 3 firePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) firePart.Transparency = 1.0 firePart.Name = "FirePart" firePart.Parent = Sword
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = firePart fire.Color = Color3.new(102/255, 0, 204/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(128/255, 128/255, 128/255) fire.Heat = 25 fire.Size = 2
local fireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") fireWeld.Name = "FireWeld" fireWeld.Part0 = Sword fireWeld.Part1 = firePart fireWeld.Parent = Sword
local daggerSound
local cooldown
local speeding = false
function lunge(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil swordOut() if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) swordUp() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) local damage = 28 if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or vCharacter == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if damage/12 + myHumanoid.Health < myHumanoid.MaxHealth then myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health + damage/12 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 25.0 if not speeding then speeding = true coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(2.0) if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end wait(0.5) speeding = false end)) end end end end end end
function swordUp() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) end
function attack() damage = slashDamage local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastAttack < 0.2) then daggerSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("DaggerSound") if daggerSound then daggerSound:Play() end lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) else attack() end lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() if fireWeld then local reWeld = fireWeld:Clone() reWeld.Parent = Sword end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
function onUnequipped() if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Stop() end if daggerSound then daggerSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
